parameters:
\#■ In the training grounds, you can purchase skills that are useful
in dungeons. The skills you purchase can be acquired by using them.

However, there is a limit to the skills that can be taken into the
dungeon, and you can equip or unequip learned skills from your
\c[18]room in the inn\c[0] or the \c[18]skill icon\c[0] on the main
screen.

The number of skill sets is limited to a maximum of three. Skills have
a set amount of required points (CP).

The maximum value of CP is 5. Taking Lightning Slash as an example,
it requires 3 CP. So, if you set Lightning Slash, you will have 2
remaining CP available for use.
【Instructor】 Welcome! You're an interesting one who has come!

【Instructor】 If even pigs like you can survive my training, each of
you will become a weapon!
D_TEXT 次の支払いまで\C[18]\v[97]\C[0]日 20
